Package bzh.plealog.bioinfo.ui.sequence.basic

Sequence Viewer: basic components.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DScrollable
    This interface defines a scrollable system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlphabetCounterDualViewer
    This class can be used to display the sequence composition.
    AlphabetCounterSingleViewer  
    DPatternSearchFacility  
    DRulerViewer
    This class implements a ruler viewer.
    DSequenceListViewer
    This is a sequence viewer.
    DSequenceScroller
    This class implements a scroller for a sequence viewer.
    DSequenceTableViewer
    This is a basic sequence viewer implemented on top of a JTable.
    DSequenceViewer
    This is a convenient class wrapping a DSequenceViewer and implements DScrollable interface.
    DSymbolRenderer
    This class implements a default symbol renderer used by the sequence viewer.
    DViewerScroller  
    MyListSelectionModel
    Used by DSequenceListViewer to disallow list selection.
    RowHeaderTable
    This class is for internal use only.
    TableDSequenceModel
    This class wraps a DSequence within a TableModel so that it can be displayed within a JTable component.
